data.title: Engil and Kyndryl team up for innovative IT services
data.meta_description: Kyndryl is leveraging cloud solutions to enhance Mota-Engil's IT infrastructure and digital workplace services for improved business outcomes.
data.text:
LISBON, April 10, 2024 — Kyndryl (NYSE:KD), the world’s largest IT infrastructure services provider, and Mota-Engil, a multinational company with operations focused on construction and infrastructure management in the segments of Engineering and Construction, Environment and Services, and Transport Concessions and Energy, have signed an agreement for Kyndryl to provide managed services for IT infrastructure and Digital Workplace services.

Kyndryl will manage part of Mota-Engil's IT environment, from the on-premises infrastructure to the existing cloud infrastructure, as well as the management of all the employees’ endpoints and the Microsoft Office 365 stack. Kyndryl will implement monitoring systems and protocols that will allow for real-time monitoring of these IT environments for large-scale data processing, making it possible to identify irregularities or failures and anticipate systems failure to reduce the business impacts.

"We selected Kyndryl as our partner based on their proven expertise and extensive experience and knowledge. Thanks to this partnership, Mota-Engil will be even more effective with prevention systems and management, helping to increase business results," said António Roque, IT Director of Mota-Engil.

The new services will allow Mota-Engil to take advantage of Kyndryl's expertise in its Cloud services and Digital Workplace services practices.

"The goal of this project is to strengthen the long relationship between Kyndryl and Mota-Engil and provide a totally revolutionary IT services, allowing Mota-Engil to keep growing their business in Portugal and in the world, so Mota-Engil can focus on their business core, supported by IT services and IT partners," said Paulo Coelho, Practices Leader, Kyndryl Portugal. "This partnership will bring to Mota-Engil Kyndryl's specialized services of an international company with strong knowledge in managing critical IT environments and allow us at Kyndryl to participate in the growth of one very important Portuguese company.”

About Mota-Engil

Mota-Engil is a leader in Portugal with a consolidated position in the rank of the 30 largest European construction groups. The Group is present in 21 countries, in three distinct geographical areas, namely Europe, Africa and Latin America. With more than 38,500 employees and a turnover of €3,804 mn in 2022, Mota-Engil performs its activities aligned with the best practices and is committed to a model of ethical, social and environmentally responsible management sustained on a unique and integrated strategic vision for the Mota-Engil of the future: a more international, innovative, sustainable and competitive Group on a global scale. For more information, visit www.mota-engil.com.

About Kyndryl

Kyndryl (NYSE: KD) is the world’s largest IT infrastructure services provider, serving thousands of enterprise customers in more than 60 countries. The company designs, builds, manages and modernizes the complex, mission-critical information systems that the world depends on every day. For more information, visit www.kyndryl.com.
